name: g(r)4[pp]1e
description:
Everything is better with grappling hooks, it's just science.

Defy gravity and the pesky flow of time as you grapple your way through a set of increasingly complex platforming levels, with new mechanics introduced to keep you on your toes and test what you've learned. 

Current build includes the first two chapters totalling about 15 levels. Levels are short and sharp, a successful run through each should take less than 20 seconds if you hit your targets! 

NOTE; This is a bare bones prototype, no menus or options just yet (If you're on a controller Y is inverted because I don't hate puppies) but assuming I don't get bored of it, future update will have the standard save\load and level select options as well as controller options. Mouse sensitivity is hiiiigh atm.
